description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for the login screen in a finance tracking and budgeting app. It handles user input for username and password, manages form validation, interacts with the authentication provider, and navigates to the registration screen.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that provides the login interface for the user.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class for LoginScreen managing form state and user interactions.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen, including form fields, validation, and navigation.
